description: The supplier has been identified at the request of specific client demand to pursue work with a provider to maintain study consistency and to match historical data, genetics, and, microbiome.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Information
† **Procurement Reference Number:** cb-7852-36569878
† **Tender Title (English):** Supply of Live Animals for Research Purposes
† **Tender Title (French):** Approvisionnement en animaux vivants pour des besoins de recherche

#### Tender Details
† **Publication Date:** August 3, 2023
† **Tender Closing Date:** August 18, 2023, 2:00 PM
† **Expected Contract Start Date:** September 1, 2023
† **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2026

#### Contract Details
† **Procurement Category:** Government Department
† **Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice
† **Procurement Method:** Advance Contract Award

#### Location
† **Region of Opportunity (English):** Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)
† **Region of Opportunity (French):** Ontario (sauf Région Capitale Nationale)
† **Region of Delivery (English):** Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)
† **Region of Delivery (French):** Ontario (sauf Région Capitale Nationale)

#### Supplier Eligibility
† This tender is only open to suppliers who have the required expertise and facilities to provide the specified animals.

#### Contact Information
† **Contracting Entity:** Kacendra Dion
† **Contact Email:** Kacendra.Dion@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
† **Contact Phone:** 438-324-8125

#### Additional Information
† Suppliers are required to provide a detailed description of their facilities, experience, and expertise in the production and maintenance of live animals for research purposes.
† The contract will be awarded to a single supplier based on the evaluation of their technical and commercial proposals.

#### Attachments
† Tender documents are available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7852/23-58070_-en_acan_jackson-laboratories.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7852/23-58070_en_acan_jackson-laboratories.pdf)
† Tender documents are also available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7852/23-58070_fr_pac_jackson-laboratories.pdf](https://canadabuys.can
